trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Long Island
There were no other sightings in Long Island on or around September 19th 2009
Summary: Bright circle radiating in a 30 degree fan straight down light went out residual light dissipated followed by 2 planes 1 heading ne and one north to west.
divs: Sighting Detailsbright light like a spot light very large radiating down 30ish degrees then dimmed out leaving cloud like glow which disapeared no smoke just light. Two objects that looked like planes appeared in area and flew out immediately . one se and one north then west. our view was south from north shore LI. Nassau Suffolk border. never saw anything like it very high in the sky. This was not an object it was a circle of light radiating down like an inverted cone. Very very bright-- military or et.
